content: candy fish recycle your candy wrappers with crochet materials size g hook ww yarn i used lion brand cotton ease a few plastic candy wrappers i used 6 whoppers wrappers pattern with main color 5sc in a ring rd1 2sc in each single_crochet around 10 rd2 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 15 rd3 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 20 rd4-7 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 20 pattern cont rd8 decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 15 rd9 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet around 10 stuff with wrappers rd10 decrease around 5 rd11 slip_stitch to close hole chain 20 r12 slip_stitch into rd11 slip_stitch bottom of fish body chain 15 r13 slip_stitch into rd11 slip_stitch chain 10 r14 slip_stitch into rd11 slip_stitch fasten_off with second color attach yarn with slip_stitch into the top of the fish chain about 50 then fasten_off and tie a knot about 10 or so chains down to make a loop i used black yarn and a yarn needle to sew an x for the eyes your cats will love the crunchy sound of their new toy pattern written by gnathalie2
